# How to Create Pull Request

## GitHub Web UI

1. Go to: https://github.com/dkortekaas/ainexo/pull/new/claude/project-audit-n6Wfn

2. Use this title:
   ```
   üöÄ Critical Audit Fixes: Security, Performance & UX Improvements
   ```

3. Copy the PR description from: `docs/PR_DESCRIPTION.md`

## PR Link
**Direct link**: https://github.com/dkortekaas/ainexo/compare/main...claude/project-audit-n6Wfn

## Quick Summary for PR

- 4 Critical Security Fixes
- 4 Major Performance Optimizations

- 19 Code Quality Enhancements

**Impact:**

- 2-3x faster database queries
